channel.title: How do you spawn a npc and make him stay there like a shop or a monster both plz

item.title: How do you spawn a npc and make him stay there like a shop or a monster both plz
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

Open up Autospawn.cfg.
And spawn a new NPC, this is the format description.

Spawn = #, # Is the ID of the NPC.
The next two numbers are the X & Y Co-Ordinates.
The next, is the high level. To find these go where you want to spawn the NPC and type in ::mypos. It will give you all you need.
The next are walk ranges, walk type and descriptions. For ranges, you’ll see x1 y1 x2 y2. Just replace it with the Co-Ordinates of the spawn, it wont move at all OR if you’re feeling clever, try to figure it out.
For Walktype put 0, and for the description… Just put anything/

CREDITS:
95% LeScape PK - He made this.
5% Me - Re-Posting it. (With better grammar )

Read full topic
